title: Goldfields Foundation Holds Q4 sanitation Review Meeting
description: The Gold Fields Ghana Foundation convened its Quarter Four (Q4) Water and Sanitation (WATSAN) Review Meeting, bringing together over 200 WATSAN Committee members from 22 host communities across the Tarkwa and Damang mines. The meeting, held at the Akoon Club …
